html:
4.20.17  1:49 am   do you hide the pain, bill

     sometimes. not others

4.20.17  1:26 am   What's the last really neat realization you had

     if you have doubled vocal tracks and you have 2 vibrato vocal takes that you know are both fine but they don't seem to match, you can nudge one of them over in time so the vibratos sync. i can't believe i never thought of doing that
4.20.17  1:24 am   Communism?

4.20.17  12:48 am   Will I miss anything important in your new video if I blink?

     it depends when you blink, and for how long

4.20.17  12:35 am   what is your opinion on the very nice plant species known as the cactus

     i have hardly seen any in real life

4.20.17  12:29 am   do you update the question page one question at a time or all at once?

     usually many questions all at once

4.20.17  12:15 am   is it called sand because its between the sea and the land?

     no, it is because it tastes salty, yet bland

4.19.17  11:30 pm   what kind of hat is a good kind of hat? (to wear)

     the thing that really makes a hat good is whether or not the person wearing it wants to wear it
4.19.17  11:17 pm   Metric or imperial system?

4.19.17  11:15 pm   what is your interpretation of existance?

     i am trying to demonstrate

4.19.17  11:06 pm   what's your biggest goal?

     to accomplish all my goals

4.19.17  10:46 pm   do you think someday we'll all be truly happy

     hopefully for more than a day

4.19.17  10:36 pm   what is the longest question you've ever received?

 you wanna check

 It couldn't be this one, could it?

 no it's not

  Does this question box have a text limit?

 it does now

 Is this question too gimmicky?

 there are no regulations currently in place for gimmicity

 Is it unoriginal?

 not completely

  Are my travels into meta-questions stupid and uncreative?

 not exactly

  Should I find out next time on Dragon Ball Z?

 the main things you can find out next time on dragon ball z is what happens next on dragon ball z

  Do you even care enough to read this?

 yes

  Will anyone else even see this?

 yes

  Is 1+1 really two

 yes

 or is it something stupid a first grader would say, like a window?

 ?

  Do you even care? Does anyone else who could potentially see this even care?

 about which part

 Is reading this question going to prolong your work time, therefore prolonging the release date of HOTEWIG?

 not prolong, but delay, and yes slightly

 Will you answer with a one-word statement like yes, no, or apparently?

 maybe

 Should I go beyond the realm of yes or no questions?

 you already have

 What even defines a question? What is keeping me from just pushing that "Ask" button, and quitting this whole question-making business completely?

 the passion for making this question submission even longer

  Why should I expect you have the answer to any of these questions?

 you don't have to expect that

  Wil l you re ward me for my valiant effort to make a really long question or will you let this burn in the depths of the bottom of unanswered question hell?

 you are doing a nice job, i've seen people do this way worse

  Have many, many other people tried to do this before?

 some people have

 Am I just an extremely self-evident smart-ass with too much time on my hands?

 time is valuable. if you have it, that is good, there are many uses for it

 Will I make an unnecessary history of japan reference?

 i'm not sure

 Will you even bother to give this question a green hyperlink? Am I too unsure of myself? Am I too sure of myself?

 you seem to have found a good balance

 Does this rambling tone sound like nails on a chalkboard in your ears?

 not really

  Will you link this in with the rest of the questions you don't understand?

 no, it is very clear to me what is going on

  Will asking questions about what you might do prevent you from doing those things?

 usually not

  Or am I overly forcing tongue-in-cheek humor beyond what it ever should be?

 you will have to check with the rules and regulations in your area

  Does being in on the joke make the joke any better?

 for some jokes, not others. some jokes are solid, so you cannot go inside

  Is this what you imagine the worst possible question could be?

 no

  Am I approaching the text limit?

 probably

 If there is no limit, is there a limit to how much of my effort and time I can give in to madly sc rawling these stupid-ass rambling inquiries?

 yes

  Do you think this is even vaguely funny?

 nothing is funny

  Or is the fact that every single sentence is a question make the whole thing sound like some sort of probe or survey?

 it sounds like a manic episode, but that's ok

  Do penguins have ankles?

 i'm not sure you will have to shave one and find out

  How many tangents can I go off of?

 the same amount as you went 'on' in the first place

  Did these questions even have a focal point at all for tangents to go off of in the first place?

 so far it has remained quite focused, and on track

  Is this some sort of protection of my self image?

 i don't know what you mean

  Is this whole thing just big questions to myself, revealing the gaping maw that is my self doubt?

 i don't think so

  Am I being way too edgy and self-deprecating?

 no

  Is the imagined upward sound that signifies the end of a question getting to you yet?

 i get hundreds of questions a day, i am used to it

  Should I care less about how I feel and talk more about you?

 you will have to decide for yourself

 Or have you already figured out that the only thing keeping this decrepit and threadbare series of questions going is self-satire?

 i think the main thing that fuels this is to acheive length while still remaining coherent and not copying and pasting

  Is it getting old?

 it sounds like you're just getting started

  When is/was a good time to stop?

 whenever you reach the text limit, you will have to stop

  Has this record already been beaten by some idiot who fell asleep on the a key?

 it has been beaten by long copypastas, before there was a text limit

  Are you in any way stran gely hon ored at the dedication of this question?

 i am proud, of you, not strangely

  Am I retreading ground?

 maybe not

  Will you even read a single word of this or will you just say (or think) "wow, what a long letter"?

 perhaps both

  Is my trying too hard the one thing preventing me from making a good question?

 effort has been a central theme to this post, and i think the quantity of questions has actually helped ensure that some of them are 'good' although i don't have a system for determining whether a question is good

  How does one even define "trying too hard"?

 check with the rules and regulations of how hard you are supposed to try, and then evaluate if how hard you are trying is more than that

  Is that even possible?

 no

 Will you not post this because it won't fit into the webpage?

 it will fit, these pages are split monthly, and there are hundreds, maybe thousands of questions on each page

 Will you format the text so it's really teeny tiny so it does fit the page?

 the page can be any size, the only loose restriction is if there is too much text on the page, people start to complain that the page loads too slow. reducing the size of the text would make no difference

  Do you think it's even worth it to try?

 no

 Would answering my question require you to ignore everyone else's questions?

 no

 Should I care?

 you can care if you want

  Does it really matter whether or not you answer my question in the grand scheme of things?

 the great thing about the grand scheme is, whichever path you choose can be part of the grand scheme. that's what makes the scheme grand

  Is that metaphorically zooming out too much?

 you will have to check with whomever gave you this assignment

  Have you noticed that by now, all the random questions have seeped out, because I'm too tired to even care?

 so far the majority of these questions have been self-referential, and not random

  Is this too meta?

 you will have to check with whomever gave you this assignment

  Is it really necessary for me to be asking all these questions?

 you will have to check with whomever gave you this assignment

  How should I possibly expect for you to know any of this?

 you can't

  Have I just been runnin g around in circles for the last 718 words?

 i'm not counting, but yes it has felt like circles for at least a little while now

  Are you vaguely impressed that I knew how many words there were or have you just given up reading?

 i suspect you did a word count. or perhaps you lied, for a thrill

  Does this constitute an essay?

 you will have to check with the rules and regulations

  Would I pass a standardized test with this?

 it depends what the question was

  Can you anagram this block of text?

 yes but it would take a long, long time and i'm not going to do it

  Is this snarky at all?

 no

  Have I used the word "or" too much?

 i think if there is a word that it seems like you are possibly over using here, it would be 'too'

  Am I asking questions for no reason or am I just very, very confused?

 i think you are very dedicated, focused, and also curious

  Should I end this stupid thing already?

 you will have to decide for yourself

4.19.17  10:32 pm   u ever questioned everything?

     yes, but usually not at the same time
4.19.17  10:27 pm   what is your favorite conspiracy?

4.19.17  10:22 pm   Are yuo dyslexic?

     no
4.19.17  10:21 pm   what do you plan on doing after HOTEWIG?
4.19.17  10:09 pm   serious question - do you have plans on doing more reality videos? I actually started to look at some of them and they're very interesting.

4.19.17  9:24 pm   If you fold a paper airplane out of sheet metal is that just an airplane?

     i think it would be considered a model airplaine, unless it can be piloted

4.19.17  9:23 pm   Out of the last five questions you answered which was your second least favorite

     ranking questions in this way is nebulous at best, and not a good use of my time

4.19.17  9:22 pm   If you mistaken for the president of Uruguay at the same moment he went missing would you just roll with it and take over his presidential duties?

     no
4.19.17  9:18 pm   Is it crazy how saying sentences backwards creates backwards sentences saying how crazy it is?

4.19.17  8:51 pm   what you up to right now?

     answering questions

4.19.17  8:32 pm   would increasing the framerate of your video only increase render time, or would it actually slow down the process of making the video?

     it would slow it down overall in many ways. it's kind of like making a cake that is twice as big. there is not 1 particular reason why it would take longer, except the simple obvious reason which encompases all the reasons - it's a bigger cake

4.19.17  8:05 pm   you ever feel like you're not on the right planet or something?

     sometimes, but i am gradually finding out why it makes sense for me to be here

4.19.17  7:23 pm   So, I've been asking questions for a while, but I want to make this clear. Ever since I watched History of Japan, I've been going through your website like an archaeologist and feel like I know like 80% more about you than everyone else. It also helps me figure out which extremely relevant questions to ask. So what is your view on this?

     i think it's great. it sounds like you are using the site to its full potential

4.19.17  7:17 pm   what's updog?

     not much whats up with you

4.19.17  7:10 pm   what if I told you I'm writing a question to you on my floor

     then i would have a chance to decide whether i think it's true

4.19.17  7:06 pm   people seem to ask a lot of you, do you try to work with their suggestions

     mostly no

      or focus exclusively on what you think you should do?

     mostly yes

4.19.17  7:00 pm   opinions on buzzfeed?

     last time i went there it looked like a typical site with ads and click bait, except there was no other content, just ads and clickbait
4.19.17  6:51 pm   will the video be out within a week? -matt

4.19.17  6:42 pm   Other than sleeping, working on the video and answering questions, what are things you do during the day?

     nothing

4.19.17  6:17 pm   can you answer this question without using the letter e

     i will try

4.19.17  5:57 pm   If a square had the area of 144 inches squared, what is the width?

     144 inches. although there is slight ambiguity in the way you phrased it, because "144 square inches" is sometimes written as 144 in^2, which looks like it is pronounched '144 inches squared' but i think '144 inches squared' actually means take a distance of 144 inches, and square it
4.19.17  5:55 pm   Indigo or violet, This matters

4.19.17  5:49 pm   Is this new video harder or easier to make than HOJ?

     harder

4.19.17  5:33 pm   You say you do the lyrics and melody at the same, but wasn't that not the case for your 2008 songs?

     i don't think i wrote or recorded any songs in 2008. maybe i wrote some in december but they did not get recorded. and the lyrics and melody would have been written at the same time, as always

4.19.17  5:32 pm   Do you think that all of existence is perpetuated by infinite interpretations, views and transformations of a single point in spacetime?

     well space time is already what we call the interpretations. so if that is derived from a single point 'in another field' then we wouldn't call that space time

4.19.17  4:56 pm   I tried "there is no password", on the reality page but it didn't let me in. Now what?

     there is no password. the next thing you should try is not entering a password, because there is no password. you do not need a password. i hope that makes sense

4.19.17  4:43 pm   can you make a video

     i am making a video
4.19.17  4:36 pm   favorite album?

4.19.17  4:16 pm   What's updog?

     not much whats up with you

4.19.17  4:12 pm   Which bear is best?

     they are not ranked

4.19.17  3:30 pm   why is everyone concerned about the frame rate?

     i don't know

4.19.17  3:14 pm   Do you think melodies exist outside of music?

     anyone is free to decide what a melody, or music, is. so if you want a melody outside of music, all you gotta do is imagine something is a melody, but not imagine that it's music. and boom, you've got a melody, outside of music
4.19.17  3:08 pm   what time zone is this questions page in?

4.19.17  2:53 pm   Fuckin' magnets, how do they work?

     it must be pure motherfuckin magic, and miracles
4.19.17  2:19 pm   If you were in a series of Pokemon, which Pokemon will you catch?

4.19.17  2:02 pm   is the order you record instrument parts for songs always different?

     no

4.19.17  1:54 pm   Tell us top-10 languages you want to learn first

     i really can't decide
